name: Anvil
description: A heavy anvil from a blacksmith’s workshop, somehow carried
around as equipment. Its hardness and weight make it perfect for
sharpening weapons, though it may be tough for the inexperienced...
ability: Senpo changes to pulling out the anvil to repair weapons
Cannot repair magic weapons or golden-quality weapons

name: Jeweled Armament
description: Minerals slumbering underground are good alchemical media
This dagger-shaped magitech device channels the power of precious
gems, but its costly use led most alchemists to abandon it…
ability: Randomly consumes a gem on attack to charge and enhance damage
The more precious the gem, the greater the added magic damage

name: Odd Hair Accessory
description: A hair accessory adorned with an unusual ornament
Is it a rabbit… or a bun…?

name: Safety Gloves
description: Protective gloves made from insulating materials,
originally used by workers as everyday safety gear. Surprisingly,
they also provide strong resistance against magical attacks...
ability: Greatly reduces the effect of lightning when equipped

name: Birth of Misfortune
description: Parasitized by a Philosopher Stone, a weak creature was forcibly
infused with endless vitality, endlessly cycling between life and
death until madness took over. Even removed, this power remains
ability: Increases HP. Enhances HP recovery effects by 25%
Grants automatic regeneration when equipped

name: Cursed Fetus
description: An undeveloped cursed fetus that, despite everything,
remains alive.Its intense will to survive and overflowing
vitality can even influence its bearer
ability: Increases HP. Enhances HP recovery effects by 20%

name: Mana Crystal Cluster
description: A mineral shaped by the Great Labyrinth, containing trace mana
Carrying it enhances magical understanding
ability: Equipping it boosts casting speed and magic power
Magical weapons’ attacks deal an extra 5% magic damage

name: Abyssal Mana Cluster
description: A rare cluster infused with dense mana,
radiating palpable magical waves. Highly sought after by alchemists
ability: Equipping it boosts casting speed and magic power
Magical weapons’ attacks deal an extra 10% magic damage

name: Focus Circlet
description: A circlet worn by the great sage during their youth as an
adventurer. It helps focus the mind and blocks external distractions
ability: Immune to Stun
Enhances magic power and casting scale

name: Mana Draining Gloves
description: Gloves worn by the great sage during their youth as
an adventurer. They gather mana naturally,
imbuing weapons with magical properties
ability: When equipped, the held weapon transforms into a magical weapon
Magical weapons’ attacks deal an extra 30% magic damage

name: Borrowed Neko Claws
subtitle: "...Meow~?"
description: Neko claws hidden inside a Neko Slime, seemingly infused
with a cat’s spirit. Equipping them boosts your agility!
ability: Increases attack power and attack speed

name: Borrowed Neko Paws
subtitle: "...Meow~?"
description: Neko paws hidden inside a Neko Slime, seemingly infused
with a cat’s spirit. Equipping them boosts your agility!
ability: Increases attack and movement speed, reduces Senpo cooldown

name: Fragrant Grass Ring
description: A ring woven from leaves and rhizomes, emitting a herbal scent
Once a charm for travelers, it symbolizes vitality and energy
ability: Max HP +\c[29]${QJ.MPMZ.tl.ex_fragrantGrassRingEffectResolve()}\c[0]
Wearing multiple of this gear enhances its effect

name: Neko Plush Suit
description: A soft and cuddly cat plush costume — fluffy and oversized
Its roomy design wraps you up and even hides extra goodies~
ability: Extra carry capacity for weapons +10
Extra carry capacity for gears +20

name: Piercing Spike Helmet
description: A spiked metal armor exuding danger from every angle,
offering solid defense and automatically damaging nearby enemies
ability: Automatically damages nearby enemies

name: Piercing Spike Armour
description: A spiked metal armor exuding danger from every angle,
offering solid defense and automatically damaging nearby enemies
ability: Automatically damages nearby enemies

name: Piercing Spike Gauntlets
description: A spiked metal armor exuding danger from every angle,
offering solid defense and automatically damaging nearby enemies
ability: Automatically damages nearby enemies when attacking

name: Piercing Spike Boots
description: A spiked metal armor exuding danger from every angle,
offering solid defense and automatically damaging nearby enemies
ability: Automatically damages nearby enemies when moving

name: Knight's Helmet
description: The standard armor of court knights. Its ornate and sturdy design
symbolizes their adherence to the chivalric code
ability: Increases defense when HP is below \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Knight's Armour
description: The standard armor of court knights. Its ornate and sturdy design
symbolizes their adherence to the chivalric code
ability: Increases defense when HP is below \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Knight's Gauntlets
description: The standard armor of court knights. Its ornate and sturdy design
symbolizes their adherence to the chivalric code
ability: Increases attack and defense when HP is below \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Knight's Greaves
description: The standard armor of court knights. Its ornate and sturdy design
symbolizes their adherence to the chivalric code
ability: Increases movement speed when HP is below \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Hunter’s Garb
description: Stitched from thick hide and tough linen, it was once the everyday
gear of forest hunters. Though defense is limited, it’s light and
flexible, letting the wearer move quickly through the woods
ability: Slowly regenerates HP when standing on grassy terrain

name: Hunter’s Belt
description: Crafted from sturdy leather and adorned with durable buckles
and pouches. Once essential for forest hunters on their journeys,
it remains light and unburdensome even during long treks
ability: Max HP +20, movement speed increased
Extra carry capacity for weapons +5, for gear +5

name: Feather of Firebird
description: A Firebird feather.
symbolizing eternal life, still burning with a warm flame.
Even a single feather holds the power to revive the dead.
ability: Activates when HP drops to zero, fully restores HP
The item is destroyed after activation

name: Toilet Paper
description: A Toilet Paper take from Home
A handy item for adventurers who suddenly need
a toilet break in a dangerous dungeon
ability: Reduces Bleed damage taken by \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Oni Hand
description: A massive arm brimming with the brute strength of the Oni clan
It symbolizes a power so fierce it can easily crush solid rock
For humans, it is a force far too difficult to control
ability: Physical attack power +100%. Attack speed decreases
Weapons are more likely to break during attacks

name: Saucy Jacky
subtitle: "This one craves screams..."
description: One of the deadly weapons of a notorious killer,
still twitching with anticipation
ability: Deals more damage to lower HP foes, up to \c[10]30%\c[0]

name: Hunter's Dagger
subtitle: "Death from the muzzle, fortune from the blade"
description: A small, sharp dagger that fits easily in a boot
To a hunter, it always draws out the prey’s final offering
ability: Increases chances of meat drops

name: Misty Night Phantom
subtitle: "This one longs to vanish..."
description: One of the deadly tools of a notorious murderer,
crafted to conceal its presence
ability: Periodically enters an invisible state
Assassinations while invisible deal double damage

name: Neko Punch
description: "Hyaa—!! Don’t mess with me nya!"
Soft-padded cat paw gloves, the prized weapon of a certain catgirl
Wearing them grants feline agility—and a craving for fish…
ability: Attack speed increased. Extra attack hits +1
Chance of extra attack hits triggering special effects is halved

name: Apple Headgear
description: A headgear made from apples, so you can't
really expect any defense. But the apples are so delicious
ability: There’s a chance to activate healing when injured

name: Sharpblade Ring
description: Legend says an adventurer, too afraid of fighting barehanded,
embedded a sword into a ring. It’s far too small to use,
but it sure boosts one’s presence
ability: Physical attack power +15%

name: Wakizashi
description: A finely crafted short blade, often carried by foreign samurai
as a sidearm. Though short, its edge can tear flesh wide open,
leaving wounds that won’t easily stop bleeding
ability: Normal attack count with melee weapons +1
Extra attack has a chance to inflict Bleed

name: Maneki Neko
description: A greedy little Servant with a perpetually unsatisfied look
It eagerly gathers all dropped items, regardless of their value
ability: Maneki Neko automatically collects all types of drops for you
Equipping multiple will only increase the collection range

name: Piggy Bank
description: A cute Servant that stores collected money
Something might happen when full, but for now, it's just fragile
ability: Happily collects money. Current savings: \c[6]${$gameSelfVariables.value([1, 110, 'deposit'])}\c[0]yen!
Easily breaks when attacked, losing all stored money

name: Greedy Piggy Bank
description: A piggy bank overflowing with wealth, a dream come true
Yet, even with a belly full of gold, its greed knows no bounds
ability: Emits Mamon’s Demand aura. Current savings: \c[6]${$gameSelfVariables.value([1, 110, 'deposit'])}\c[0]yen!
Collects money endlessly, spitting out interest every 10 seconds

name: Green Turtle Shell
description: A tough and heavy turtle shell
Carrying it on land makes it impossible to lift your feet…!
ability: Slows movement speed, but increases swimming speed

name: Maid Uniform
description: A trophy obtained after teaching a lesson to the mischievous
rabbit-eared girl. It still carries the scent of dirt and carrots
ability: When equipped, disguises as a monster but cannot attack
Equipping it makes you best friends with Maid Bunny

name: Moe Bunny Ears
description: A detachable bunny ear accessory
No matter who wears it, they’ll look absolutely adorable!
ability: Blessed with luck! Items are more likely to drop!

name: Bomb Fiend's Soul
subtitle: "Explo————sion!!"
description: A will that sacrificed everything for explosions
Now that you bear it, won’t you strive for even bigger blasts?
ability: Small chance to trigger an explosion when attacking or hit
Reduce self-taken explosion damage by 50%

name: Bladekeepers’ Badge
subtitle: "You adventurers make me sick!
Swinging your blades only to kill, never caring about their pain!"
description: A badge worn only by comrades who believe in weapon preservation
ability: Attack power -20%, max attack capped at 200
Reduces all weapon durability loss by 20%

subtitle: "The Sacabambaspis has seen it all before."
description: A legendary ancient Servant—though it’s a fish, it can’t swim
It has tough skin, and its special move is a Cyclone Jet Cannon!
ability: Can lift up the Saccabankame turtle and throw it as an attack
Once it falls into the water, it can’t get back out...

name: Venomous Embrace
subtitle: "This dagger's loaded with deadly poison, y'know— (lick"
description: A poisonous magical shortsword—keep your distance
ability: An auto-orbiting Servant
High chance to inflict Poison on contact

name: Fist of Fury
description: A powerful magical fist
Seething with unknown rage, it remains tightly clenched…
ability: An auto-orbiting Servant
Knocks back any enemy it touches

name: Xerise’s Cursed Hand
description: A severed hand imbued with undead power
Even without a body, it remains lively and aggressive
ability: An auto-orbiting Servant
Curses any target it points its middle finger at

name: Chain SpellBinding Contract
subtitle: "When the one you love dies, you must take your own life.
When the one you love dies, there is no other way."
description: To save his familiar, a certain alchemist forged this contract…
ability: Link with your servant—any damage they take will be yours
Each linked servant grants you a healing effect

name: Red Horn
subtitle: "Don't you ever stop！"
description: A crimson horn filled with the Jackalope’s magic
If magic could be supplied endlessly, it might keep accelerating
until it became a comet streaking across the sky!
ability: When fully charged, Senpo has no cooldown and moves faster
Once the charge is depleted, it will auto-recharge

name: Potato Chips
description: Freshly fried with a warm,
savory aroma. Watch out for seagulls!
ability: Attracts seagulls that steal your chips

name: Shadowcrawler Gift
description: Said to be a symbol from the depths where shadows creep
holding it makes you feel as if something is
quietly writhing behind you—
ability: Movement speed increases
Gain the attention of ▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

name: Hanged Man's Bone Ring
description: A ring made from the bones of the deceased Hanged Man
Though most of its power is lost,
it still grants the wearer a bit of freedom from gravity
ability: Reduces fall damage by 66%

name: Incomplete Golden Grail
description: A saint’s relic yet to be filled, it blesses the holder with
immense luck. The source of this blessing remains unknown,
as it quietly awaits the day it will be complete
ability: Greatly increases luck. Doubles money earned

name: Arsonist’s Gloves
subtitle: "Hah, Such filthy fireworks."
description: Thick, heatproof gloves reeking of gunpowder
ability: +30% explosion radius for self-triggered bombs
Bombs have a chance to trigger chain explosions

name: Saint Maiden’s Mercy
subtitle: "Good child, good child..."
description: One of the nun's attires, silky smooth to the touch, unforgettable
Holy radiance flows through its fibers, offering comfort
ability: Forcibly enters Sage Mode
Gain more affinity when patting \str[120]’s head

name: Ichigo Wo Torimodose!!
description: ASABA, consumed by grief over the lost strawberry,
unleashes his ultimate art. Once targeted, you’re swallowed
by an unavoidable storm of combos… But sorrow lingers—
burned by fate’s emotions, you too inherit this forbidden technique!
ability: Unleash a special move with the right command
The lower your HP, the stronger the special move

name: Rubrum Pendant
description: The Fallen Magician’s Precious Relic.
A pendant crafted from a small amount of Philosopher's Fragment
imbued with a faint yet everlasting alchemical power
ability: Boosts magic attack based on held Philosopher's Fragment count
Reduces weapon durability use when casting magic by \c[6]24%\c[0]

name: Fallen Mage's Circlet
description: A cursed circlet tainted by dark magic,
haunted by a stubborn grudge that gnaws at the flesh
ability: Magic attack power +100%
Max HP -50%

name: Fallen Mage's Cloak
description: A cursed cloak tainted by dark magic,
haunted by a vengeful spirit craving retribution
ability: Afterimages created by Senpo linger longer
Objects touched by them are frozen in place

name: Fallen Mage's Gloves
description: Cursed gloves tainted by dark magic,
infused with a vengeful spirit eager to attack
ability: Projectiles track nearby enemies

name: Fallen Mage's Shoes
description: Cursed shoes tainted by dark magic,
infused with a vengeful spirit that grants ghost-like agility
ability: Boosts movement speed, grants void state when using Senpo

name: Determination Headband
subtitle: "Who the hell do you think I am!?"
description: A headband that stirs passion when worn
No real effect, but its unyielding spirit is unmatched
ability: reduces abnormal status chance
Has a small chance to resist fatal damage

name: Martial Artist's Bracers
description: Bandaged bracers worn by martial artists during sparring
They protect joints while improving movement precision
ability: -12% weapon durability consumption
Increased attack speed & boosted unarmed combo damage

name: Martial Artist's Shoes
description: Shoes commonly worn by martial artists who have
mastered their craft, radiating a powerful aura
ability: Movement speed increased. Senpo enhanced

name: Face Breaker
subtitle: "Damn it... I just wanna punch someone in the face...!"
description: Punching gloves left behind by a legendary boxer.
You can still feel the overwhelming force lingering on them.
ability: Cannot use weapons while equipped
Punch attacks may deal bonus damage based on target HP

name: Scarecrow's Heart
description: A hollow body of a scarecrow
No warmth, no heartbeat—yet it can live in your place
ability: Prevents all forms of HP recovery while equipped
At 0 HP, you remain active a bit longer before falling

name: Lava Ring
description: A ring forged from rock flowing with scorching magma
Wearing it eases the pain from both frost and flame
ability: Greatly reduces the chance of being frozen
Reduces the chance of being burned

name: Volumen Salamandrae
subtitle: "Yes, they do like chili peppers..."
description: A grimoire bound with salamander scales. Though it resembles
an encyclopedia, its records of volcano-dwelling salamanders
grant deeper insight into fire when studied.
ability: Strengthens the damage and form of fire-element magic

name: Royal Decree
description: A ring symbolizing the supreme glory of a true king
Greatly boosts follower morale!
ability: Slightly increases all stats
Enlarges all servants and enhances their special attributes

name: Unit I Nexus
description: A core far more advanced than modern tech, its surface glowing
with mysterious energy circuits. Even with most parts missing,
it still shows incredible computational and sensing power
ability: Grants area detection when equipped
Detected object types increase as the core’s level rises

name: Atsu Atsu Bouzu
description: A cloth doll made with someone's heartfelt prayers. It carries
wishes, bringing slight changes to regular weather patterns
However, The doll quietly disappears afterward
ability: Ensures scorching hot weather the next day when equipped

name: Teru Teru Bouzu
description: A cloth doll made with someone's heartfelt prayers. It carries
wishes, bringing slight changes to regular weather patterns
However, The doll quietly disappears afterward
ability: Ensures sunny weather the next day when equipped

name: Kumo Kumo Bouzu
description: A cloth doll made with someone's heartfelt prayers. It carries
wishes, bringing slight changes to regular weather patterns
However, The doll quietly disappears afterward
ability: Ensures cloudy weather the next day when equipped

name: Ame Ame Bouzu
description: A cloth doll made with someone's heartfelt prayers. It carries
wishes, bringing slight changes to regular weather patterns
However, The doll quietly disappears afterward
ability: Ensures rainy weather the next day when equipped

name: A girl's smile
subtitle: "\str[121], you kept your promise well!"
description: The little sister who always admired and worried about
her \str[121] finally shows a satisfied smile
For \str[121], it's enough to be the motivation to keep going
ability: Desire up, all stats up

name: \str[120]'s removed panties
subtitle: "It still carries \str[120]'s scent..."
description: Panties received from \str[120] due to a misunderstanding
Never returned, but deep down, there's happiness
ability: Inspired by \str[120]. When HP < 50%, gain auto-recovery

name: Bunny Plush
subtitle: "Waaah—! Don’t break it~~!"
description: A stuffed bunny plush that \str[120] always carries in
her arms, filled with her scent
Come to think of it… why is this in my hands?

name: Bonus T-shirt
description: A custom-made outfit from the knight,
supposedly for promoting the game
But I don’t really want to wear it

name: \str[120]’s Pajamas
description: A camisole pajama that \str[120] usually wears,
decorated with the bows she loves.
Come to think of it… why is this in my hands?

name: \str[120]’s Shorts
description: Soft and fluffy shorts that \str[120] usually wears,
decorated with the bows she loves.
Come to think of it… why is this in my hands?

name: Ruika’s Lucky Mallet
subtitle: "Head Maid Ruika always uses it to bonk the disobedient bunnies."
description: A hidden treasure of Maid Bunnies, said to be why they took over the
market so fast. With a light swing, it grants the wielder’s wishes—
Adventurers often see it fixing machines broken by troublemakers
ability: Increases money and item drop rates

name: Mio’s First Aid Kit
subtitle: "Oh my god! I fell into the hole again!?"
description: Originally a tool the admin used to test the healing system
but he forgot to delete it later. Still, it’s useless
against instant-death mechanics
ability: Restores 100% HP per second when equipped

name: Shiroin’s Golden Finger
subtitle: "You know this thing will ruin the game, right?"
"I know."
"And you still want to equip it?"
"Of course."
description: A relic that turns touch to gold — the Bladekeepers’ ultimate dream
ability: Weapons no longer break from attacks

name: Absolute Territory
description: The sacred space between a girl's miniskirt and thigh-high socks
Not only does it grant high magic resistance, but also the absurd
ability to pull out all sorts of items from under the skirt at will
ability: Extra carry capacity for weapons +99
Extra carry capacity for gears +99

name: Catalyst Amatoria
subtitle: "Give me your love—! Otherwise, let’s just die together~~~!"
description: A forbidden artifact forged by a certain yandere archdemon
It forcibly makes anyone it touches fall in love with the wearer
ignoring their will
ability: Greatly boosts the stats gained when patting \str[120]
